pullrequest.title: Implement the first simple version of soft label

content.raw:
This one particular line, without inspecting what `modify_supervision_label_extension` does, is not at all obvious to what it's doing. There is a magic number of '1'. There needs to be a comment or a constant representing what the 1 is supposed to represent.

You may also want to consider modifying `modify_supervision_label` so that the default value for the first argument is always 1 so you don't even need to specify here (if it should be the default case).
content.html:
This one particular line, without inspecting what modify_supervision_label_extension does, is not at all obvious to what it's doing. There is a magic number of '1'. There needs to be a comment or a constant representing what the 1 is supposed to represent.

You may also want to consider modifying modify_supervision_label so that the default value for the first argument is always 1 so you don't even need to specify here (if it should be the default case).
